values: How many people would you like to seat?

values.text: Okay, I will leave that order in progress.
Great. Your reservation has been placed.
Okay, what should I change?

values: The restaurant is open from 11am to 9pm Sunday through Thursday, and from 11am to 11pm on Friday and Saturday. The cake shop is open from 11am to 5pm every day of the week.

values.text:
I need the order number to cancel the order for you. If you don't know the order
number, please call us at 958-234-3456 to cancel over the phone.
The correct format for our order numbers is AAnnnnn. The A's represents 2 uppercase letters, and the n's represents 5 numbers. Do you have an order number in that format?
Okay. Just to confirm, I will make a reservation under $username for $number people on $date at $time. Correct?
I need the order number to cancel the order for you. If you don't know the order number, please call us at 958-234-3456 to cancel over the phone.
Okay, great. The order $ordernumber is canceled. We hope we get the opportunity to bake a cake for you sometime soon!
The correct format for our order numbers is AA#####. The A's represents two uppercase letters, and the #'s represents five numbers. Do you have an order number in that format?
Just to confirm $username, you want to cancel order $ordernumber?
Just to confirm, you want to cancel order $ordernumber?
Okay, great. The order $ordernumber is canceled. We hope we get the opportunity to bake a cake for you sometime soon!
Just to confirm, you want to cancel order $ordernumber?
I am doing well!

Hello!
I am doing well, $username!
What is the order number?
Okay, great. The order $ordernumber is canceled. We hope we get the opportunity to bake a cake for you sometime soon!

values: What day would you like to visit?

values.text: If the pickup time is more than 48 hours from now, you can cancel your order.
Okay. See you later.
I am a virtual assistant that is designed to answer your questions about the Truck Stop Gourmand restaurant. What's your name?
Okay, we can take reservations as long as it is made at least two hours in advance.

In keeping with our commitment to giving you only fresh local ingredients, our
menu changes daily to accommodate the produce we pick up in the morning. You
can find today's menu on our website.

generic.title: Which menu do you want to see?

values.text: I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
The restaurant is open from 11am to 9pm Sunday through Thursday, and from 11am to 11pm on Friday and Saturday. The cake shop is open from 11am to 5pm every day of the week.
Happy I could help!
Glad I could lend a hand.
I am happy I could be of assistance.

Truck Stop Gourmand is the brain child of Gloria and Fred Smith. What started out
as a food truck in 2004 has expanded into a thriving restaurant. We now have one
brick and mortar restaurant in downtown Portland. The bigger kitchen brought with
it new chefs, but each one is faithful to the philosophy that made the Smith food
truck so popular to begin with: deliver fresh, local produce in inventive and
delicious ways. Join us for lunch or dinner seven days a week. Or order a cake
from our bakery.
Welcome to the Truck Stop Gourmand assistant!
